text: Why Girls Leave Home is a 1921 American silent drama movie directed by William Nigh. It stars Anna Q. Nilsson, Claude King, Julia Swayne Gordon, Corinne Barker, Katherine Perry, Coit Albertson, George Lessey and Dan Mason. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1921 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by William Nigh Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Why Girls Leave Home (1921 movie)
